General.Name: Utron Ltd
General.Description: Utron Ltd engages in the planning, development, production, construction, marketing, and maintenance of autonomous parking solutions. The company is also involved in the garage management system. In addition, it provides U-tron mobile app that enable users to park and retrieve their vehicles from their mobile devices; automated parking kiosks, including multi-touch parking, graphics standard, and basic textual kiosks; and reception room screen, which provides airport departures/arrivals display systems, the U-tron screen seamlessly updates on estimated arrival times, and bay room number for delivery of vehicle with a request made by using the U-tron app or the parking kiosk. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Airport City, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Yair  Goldberg
2.Title: Exec. VP of Global Sales & Marketing
